div.p: Base coordinate systems start and end measurements for variants
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/genetic-coordinate-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: 0-based numbering or interbase coordinate system, inclusive start, exclusive end
1 for 1-based numbering or base coordinate system, inclusive start, inclusive end
1-based [inclusive start, inclusive end] - with Variant Method (HGVS-like)

description.value: Base coordinate systems start and end measurements for variants

definition.value: 0-based numbering or interbase coordinate system, inclusive start, exclusive end
1 for 1-based numbering or base coordinate system, inclusive start, inclusive end
1-based [inclusive start, inclusive end] - with Variant Method (HGVS-like)
